skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff on the target for 3 turns. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 35%.
skills.name: Perfect Venom

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [True Fear] debuff for 1 turn. Also places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 3 turns and decreases the Turn Meters of all enemies by 50%.
skills.name: Wave of Finality

skills.desc: Places a [HP Burn] debuff for 1 turn on the attacker when hit.
skills.name: Acidic Blood [P]

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 60%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance II
